Heart.Text: This’ll help with the cholesterol levels.
With two of these I’ll be way faster!

Lung.Text: Now Dad can breathe easy. Heh heh. Get it?
Thanks, the air here is filthy! When will they replace the filtration systems?

Kidney.Text: Excellent, I’ll lease this one to some junkie.
I never realised how bean-shaped these were.
Phew! I rented both of mine out.

Liver.Text: Thanks. If you’ll excuse me, I need a drink.
What’s all this scarring on the liver?
You know if you take part of the liver out, it’ll regenerate? There’s eight people walking around with livers from me!

Brain.Text: Thanks, Mum's dementia is getting pretty bad.

Intestines.Text: How do they pack it down so tight?
Eww. This still has food inside it…

Eyes.Text: Brown? I wanted green. Oh, well.

Skin.Text: Oh, it’s all in a big mushy pile. Lovely.
I thought it’d be folded like a fitted sheet.
